charges.charge_description: 18 USC 1544 Misuse of passport - Whoever willfully and knowingly uses, or attempts to use, any passport issued or designed for the use of another  18 USC 1001(a)(2)  False Statements - Whoever knowingly and willfully makes any materially false, fictitious, or fraudulent statement or representation

charges.charge_offence_description: 18 USC 1544 Misuse of passport - Whoever willfully
